##### FILE: host_based_ingress.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/host-based-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: host-based-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: nginx.application
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: nginx-service
            port:
              number: 8090
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  - host: python.application
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: python-web-app-service
            port:
              number: 8900
        path: /demo
        pathType: Prefix

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.

    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
      hostPort: 12346
    - containerPort: 12348
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

##### FILE: hostports241.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345
    - containerPort: 12347
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
      hostPort: 12346
    - containerPort: 12348
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345
    - containerPort: 12347
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
      hostPort: 12346
    - containerPort: 12348
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: hostports246.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345
    - containerPort: 12347
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
      hostPort: 12346
    - containerPort: 12348
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345
    - containerPort: 12347
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
      hostPort: 12346
    - containerPort: 12348
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: hostports248.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345
    - containerPort: 12347
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
      hostPort: 12346
    - containerPort: 12348
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

        - ALL

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345
    - containerPort: 12347
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
      hostPort: 12346
    - containerPort: 12348
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: hostports252.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345
    - containerPort: 12347
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
      hostPort: 12346
    - containerPort: 12348
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

kind: Pod

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345
    - containerPort: 12347
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
      hostPort: 12346
    - containerPort: 12348
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause

      hostPort: 12345
    - containerPort: 12347

      hostPort: 12346
    - containerPort: 12348
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

##### FILE: hostports2660.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345
    - containerPort: 12347
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
      hostPort: 12346
    - containerPort: 12348
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345
    - containerPort: 12347
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
      hostPort: 12346
    - containerPort: 12348
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345
    - containerPort: 12347
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
      hostPort: 12346
    - containerPort: 12348
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345
    - containerPort: 12347
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
      hostPort: 12346
    - containerPort: 12348
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345
    - containerPort: 12347
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
      hostPort: 12346
    - containerPort: 12348
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

  - list
  - patch
  - update

kind: Deployment

  name: netbox-housekeeping
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: netbox
      role: housekeeping
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: netbox
        role: housekeeping
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /opt/netbox/housekeeping.sh
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: netbox-env
        - secretRef:
            name: netbox-secret-key
        image: docker.io/netboxcommunity/netbox
        name: housekeeping
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /media
          name: media
      volumes:
      - name: media
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: netbox-media

##### FILE: hpa1020.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/HorizontalPodAutoscaler/hpa-resource-metrics-memory:
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: hpa-resource-metrics-memory
  namespace: default
spec:
  behavior:
    scaleDown:
      policies:
      - periodSeconds: 60
        type: Pods
        value: 3
      - periodSeconds: 60
        type: Percent
        value: 10
      selectPolicy: Max
      stabilizationWindowSeconds: 300
  maxReplicas: 10
  metrics:
  - resource:
      name: memory
      target:
        averageValue: 500Mi
        type: AverageValue
    type: Resource
  minReplicas: 3
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: sample-spring-boot-on-kubernetes-deployment

---

##### FILE: hpa12.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/HorizontalPodAutoscaler/hpa-load-test:
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: hpa-load-test
  namespace: default
spec:
  behavior:
    scaleDown:
      policies:
      - periodSeconds: 30
        type: Percent
        value: 50
      stabilizationWindowSeconds: 30
    scaleUp:
      policies:
      - periodSeconds: 30
        type: Percent
        value: 50
      stabilizationWindowSeconds: 30
  maxReplicas: 10
  metrics:
  - resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        averageUtilization: 50
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  - resource:
      name: memory
      target:
        averageUtilization: 70
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  minReplicas: 1
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: hpa-load-test

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/HorizontalPodAutoscaler/bot-scaling-ngrok-h:
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: bot-scaling-ngrok-h
  namespace: default
spec:
  maxReplicas: 2
  metrics:
  - resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        averageUtilization: 50
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  minReplicas: 1
  scaleDown:
    policies:
    - periodSeconds: 15
      type: Pods
      value: 1
    selectPolicy: Max
    stabilizationWindowSeconds: 10s
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: ngrok-bot-deploy-h
  scaleUp:
    policies:
    - periodSeconds: 15
      type: Pods
      value: 1
    selectPolicy: Max
    stabilizationWindowSeconds: 10s

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dashboard-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dashboard-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 5
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: dashboard
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: dashboard
        version: 1.0.0
      name: dashboard-pod
      spec:
        containers:
        - image: shaikkhajaibrahim/dashboardservice:1.0.0
          name: dashboard
          ports:
          - containerPort: 80

##### FILE: hpa-2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/HorizontalPodAutoscaler/training:
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  labels:
    app: training
    tier: backend
  name: training
  namespace: default
spec:
  behavior:
    scaleDown:
      policies:
      - periodSeconds: 15
        type: Percent
        value: 100
      stabilizationWindowSeconds: 0
    scaleUp:
      policies:
      - periodSeconds: 15
        type: Pods
        value: 1
      selectPolicy: Max
      stabilizationWindowSeconds: 0
  maxReplicas: 100
  metrics:
  - resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        averageUtilization: 80
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  minReplicas: 1
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: training

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 1

##### FILE: HPA231_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hpadeployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    name: hpadeployment
  name: hpadeployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hpapod
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hpapod
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: hpacontainer
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 150m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi

---

1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/HorizontalPodAutoscaler/test-hpa:
apiVersion: v1
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: test-hpa
  namespace: default
spec:
  behavior:
    scaleDown:
      periodSeconds: 60
      type: Pods
      value: 1
    scaleUp:
      periodSeconds: 60
      type: Pods
      value: 1
  maxReplicas: 3
  metrics:
  - name: cpu
    target:
      averageUtilization: 50
      lowerThreshold: 20
      type: Utilization
      upperThreshold: 80
  minReplicas: 1
  scaleTargetRef:
    kind: ReplicaSet
    name: nginx-replicaset
    namespace: default
  scaleWindowSeconds: 20

##### FILE: hpa-cpu-only.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/HorizontalPodAutoscaler/hpa-shuffle-kstreams:
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: hpa-shuffle-kstreams
  namespace: default
spec:
  behavior:
    scaleDown:
      policies:
      - periodSeconds: 15
        type: Pods
        value: 3
      stabilizationWindowSeconds: 60
    scaleUp:
      policies:
      - periodSeconds: 60
        type: Pods
        value: 2
  maxReplicas: 10
  metrics:
  - external:
      metric:
        name: consumer_cpu_utilization_30s
      target:
        type: Value
        value: 80
    type: External
  minReplicas: 1
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: shuffle-kstreams

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 1 

##### FILE: hpa-custom.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/HorizontalPodAutoscaler/hpa-shuffle-kstreams:
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: hpa-shuffle-kstreams
  namespace: default
spec:
  behavior:
    scaleDown:
      policies:
      - periodSeconds: 15
        type: Pods
        value: 3
      stabilizationWindowSeconds: 60
    scaleUp:
      policies:
      - periodSeconds: 60
        type: Pods
        value: 2
  maxReplicas: 10
  metrics:
  - external:
      metric:
        name: kafka_input_lag
        selector:
          matchLabels:
            consumergroup: shufflebench-kstreams
            topic: input
      target:
        type: Value
        value: 3000k
    type: External
  - external:
      metric:
        name: consumer_cpu_utilization_30s
      target:
        type: Value
        value: 80
    type: External
  minReplicas: 1
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: shuffle-kstreams

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 1

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    type: webapp
  name: hpa-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      type: webapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        type: webapp
      name: hpa-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: hpa-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m

##### FILE: hpa-deployment5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
          requests:
            cpu: 100m

---

##### FILE: hpa-example.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hpa-example:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: hpa-example
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hpa
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hpa
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: k8s.gcr.io/hpa-example
        name: hello
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 0.5

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/HorizontalPodAutoscaler/k8s-autoscaler:
apiVersion: autoscaling/v1
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: k8s-autoscaler
  namespace: default
spec:
  maxReplicas: 10
  minReplicas: 2
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: k8s-autoscaler
  targetCPUUtilizationPercentage: 10

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: hello-server
  name: hpa-handson
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hello-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hello-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: blux2/hello-server:1.8
        name: hello-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 10Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 10Mi

---

##### FILE: hpa-hello-server_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/HorizontalPodAutoscaler/hello-server-hpa:
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: hello-server-hpa
  namespace: default
spec:
  maxReplicas: 10
  metrics:
  - resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        averageUtilization: 50
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  minReplicas: 1
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: hpa-handson

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/HorizontalPodAutoscaler/test-hpa:
apiVersion: v1
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: test-hpa
  namespace: default
spec:
  behavior:
    scaleDown:
      periodSeconds: 60
      type: Pods
      value: 1
    scaleUp:
      periodSeconds: 60
      type: Pods
      value: 1
  maxReplicas: 3
  metrics:
  - name: memory
    target:
      AverageValue: 100
      type: AverageValue
  minReplicas: 1
  scaleTargetRef:
    kind: ReplicaSet
    name: nginx-replicaset
    namespace: default
  scaleWindowSeconds: 20

---

      app: php-apache
  template:

        app: php-apache

      - image: k8s.gcr.io/hpa-example

          requests:

##### FILE: hpa-web-ms.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/HorizontalPodAutoscaler/web-hpa:
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: web-hpa
  namespace: default
spec:
  behavior:
    scaleDown:
      policies:
      - periodSeconds: 20
        type: Percent
        value: 40
      stabilizationWindowSeconds: 100
    scaleUp:
      policies:
      - periodSeconds: 15
        type: Percent
        value: 20
      stabilizationWindowSeconds: 100
  maxReplicas: 20
  metrics:
  - resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        averageUtilization: 120
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  minReplicas: 3
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: web

---


Mutation:
